title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Peyton Manning on GM Jobs + Trey Lance, Cowboys with Matt Mosley, NFL Week 1 Best Bets
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast Prime Cuts - Peyton Manning on GM Jobs + Trey Lance, Cowboys with Matt Mosley, NFL Week 1 Best Bets
description:
This is Prime Cuts! The best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast. First, Colin defends Jim Harbaugh against agenda-driven media criticism he still somehow gets after winning everywhere he’s ever coached, and  explains the biggest unintended consequence of the college football transfer portal

Then, 5-time MVP, 2-time Super Bowl champ - and host of the Capital One College Bowl - Peyton Manning on if he would ever take a GM job, the value of the Niners playing Trey Lance now, and the most important trait he looks for in young QB's.

Then, longtime Cowboys columnist - and host of The Doomsday Podcast - Matt Mosley joins Colin on realistic expectations for 40 year-old tackle Jason Peters replacing Tyron Smith and  if Jerry Jones is turning into Al Davis.

Then the Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL Week 1 picks are "sharp" or "square" for Packers/Vikings, Eagles/Lions, and Browns/Panthers.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
